actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Resolution requiring joint hearings and a comprehensive study by the Committees on Interior and Insular Affairs, International Relations, Interstate and Foreign Commerce, and Science and Technology on nuclear energy.

summary.text: Directs the House Committees on Interior and Insular Affairs, International Relations, Interstate and Foreign Commerce, and Science and Technology to conduct joint hearings and a comprehensive study to assist Congress in developing a nuclear energy policy.

titles.title: Resolution requiring joint hearings and a comprehensive study by the Committees on Interior and Insular Affairs, International Relations, Interstate and Foreign Commerce, and Science and Technology on nuclear energy.
